articles.author: Editor
articles.description: CELTIC teen ace Rocco Vata is in seventh heaven after scoring on his debut during the team’s runaway 7-0 win over SC Wiener Viktoria in Austria last night. The 17-year-old attacking midfielder, son of former Hoops star Rudi, sealed the triumph for Ange Postecoglou’s side in their opening pre-season outing when he raced clear to [...]
articles.title: HIGH PRAISE FOR CELTIC RISING STAR – FROM ALBANIAN PRESIDENT!

articles.author: Editor
articles.description: KARAMOKO DEMBELE brought an end to speculation he may remain at Celtic at the end of his contract when he sealed a four-year deal with Ligue 1 side Stade Brest. While the 19-year-old winger headed for a new career in France, Boli Bolingoli was linked with Championship outfit Reading and Christopher Jullien was left in [...]
articles.title: CELTIC TRANSFER UPDATE: DEMBELE SEALS FRENCH DEAL, BOLINGOLI ON BRINK, JULLIEN JEOPARDY

articles.author: Editor
articles.description: FILIPE JOTA has warned opponents the best is yet to come. The flamboyant winger shredded rearguards during his loan season at Celtic as he scored 13 goals in all competitions and was involved numerous assists. Ange Postecoglou moved to make the switch permanent as Jota agreed at five-year deal yesterday and Benfica accepted a £6.5million [...]
articles.title: CELTIC TRANSFER UPDATE: JOTA’S WARNING, SOUZA GREEN LIGHT, STRIKER IS FRENCH TARGET, CITY KID JOINS BURNLEY

articles.author: Editor
articles.description: CELTIC new Bhoy Alexandro Bernabei is determined to become a champion at Parkhead. The Argentinian left-back sealed a five-year deal in his £3.75million switch from Lanus yesterday, as Scotzine reported. Now the 21-year-old defender is eager to get into the thick of the action when the Hoops travel to Austria on Monday for their 10-day [...]
articles.title: BERNABEI REVEALS CELTIC TARGETS

articles.author: Editor
articles.description: ALEXANDO BERNABEI has agreed a five-year deal at Celtic. Argentinian side Lanus were first to make the announcement in the early hours of the morning that their 21-year-old left-back had sealed his £3.75million contract at the champions. The South American oufit got in ahead of the Hoops in going public with the news the former Under-19 [...]
articles.title: DONE DEALS: BERNABEI IN, JOTA NEXT

articles.author: Editor
articles.description: DAIZEN MAEDA has revealed the reason he quit the J-League to join Celtic. The versatile forward, whose £2million deal was rubber-stamped at the end of the season, admitted he could not resist the lure of teaming up again with Ange Postecoglou. It was the Greek-Australian who took the 24-year-old to Yokohama F Marinos in February [...]
articles.title: REVEALED: MAEDA’S REASON FOR CELTIC MOVE

articles.author: Editor
articles.description: ANGE POSTECOGLOU will step up the transfer business as he prepares for Celtic returning to pre-season training at Lennoxtown on Monday. The Hoops boss completed the signing of 30-year-old Swiss keeper Benjamin Siegrist who agreed a four-year contract after leaving Dundee United at the end of his deal last month. Postecoglou sanctioned the season-long loan [...]
articles.title: CELTIC TRANSFER UPDATE: SIEGRIST SIGNS, SCALES LEAVES ON LOAN, BERNABEI GO-AHEAD, SEMEDA, SOUZA LATEST

articles.author: Editor
articles.description: ANGE POSTECOGLOU has welcomed Harry Kewell to Celtic after the club confirmed the Australian star’s appointment as first-team coach. Former Hoops skipper and central defender Stephen McManus will take over the club’s B team as part of the restructure. Postecoglou is delighted with the arrival of 43-year-old 58 times-capped international who played for Liverpool, Leeds [...]
articles.title: AUSSIES RULE: ANGE WELCOMES NEW BHOY KEWELL

articles.author: Editor
articles.description: VIRTUAL unknown Ange Postecoglou was appointed Celtic manager EXACTLY a year ago today. The Athens-born coach may have been the former World Cup boss of Australia and won titles Down Under and in Japan, but not a lot was known of his qualities in European football. Twelve months later, we all know the name Ange [...]
articles.title: ‘HARDEST YEAR I’VE EVER HAD,’ REVEALS POSTECOGLOU
